name: LifeHacker
0:
”Alexa, open life hacker”
”Alexa, start life hacker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life hacker
des:
Alexa skill that provides great life hacks & pro tips sourced from r/LifeProTips

Updated daily!

Get a new tip simply by starting the skill. Just say Alexa open life hacker and you're good to go.

In addition to getting random awesome tips, you can now ask for tips that matter to you. You can ask the life hacker skill to give you tips from specific categories. The supported categories, for now, are:

 - Animals and Pets
 - Arts and Culture
 - Careers and Work
 - Clothing
 - Computers
 - Electronics
 - Food and Drink
 - Home and Garden
 - Miscellaneous
 - Productivity
 - School and College
 - Social
 - Traveling
 - Health and Fitness

You can access this list through the skill by saying "List Categories".

A new "Review" command is added in this version. Now if you get a tip that is misspelled, inappropriate, no longer relevant, or anything you consider should be reviewed, just say "Review it" or "Review that tip" and I'll review the tip and fix the issue.

If you didn't quite understand a tip, you can always ask Alexa to repeat it by saying "Repeat it" or "Repeat the last tip" or "come again?" etc.

The Help command now gives a more thorough description of all the features in the skill.
